msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides except at the top where it has been torn off. Kollesis in the left column of writing. (TC).

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)
Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Didymion, son of Petheus, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 161)
Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Euhemeros, son of Aunes, grandson of Aunes, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164)
Pakysis, son of Kalatytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 195)
Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Pnepheros, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245
Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamystha (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 179)
Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Euhemeros, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164)
Sarapion, son of Apollonios. grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)
Sarapion, son of Phaseis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Sarapion, son of Valerius, grandson of Sarapion, mother Stotoetis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Erieus, mother Anthia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Petheus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Maron, son of Limnaios, grandson of Maron, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Isidoros, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 179)
Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sampathios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Petsraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Lucius Longinus Gemellus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 177)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column) 1[5]:;Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4, obols 3;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Didymion, son of Petheus, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Euhemeros, son of Aunes, grandson of Aunes, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8;;Pakysis, son of Kalatytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day, drachmas 104, obols 2;;(Tybi) 21 likewise:;Heron, son of Sisois, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Didymarion, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 12;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, obols 28;;Euhemeros, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 4, obols 28;;in total for the day, drachmas 64, obols 25;;(Tybi) 22 likewise:;Pakysis, son of Kastor, grandson of Pakysis, mother Teseuris, drachmas 16;;12th year the same, copper drachmas 8, ? drachmas;;Sarapion, son of Apollonios. grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Phaseis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Valerius, grandson of Sarapion, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Erieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;12th year Maron, son of Limnaios, grandson of Maron, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 8;;in total for the day, drachmas 76, obols 18 of which 12th year drachmas 16, obols 20;;(Tybi) 23 likewise:;Isidoros, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sampathios, drachmas 8;;Petsraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, obols 28;;Lucius Longinus Gemellus, a third of the bath tax for the 13th year and additional charges drachmas 12;;Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous, drachmas 16."
